text.en: At the feet of the glorious guru, the victorious ones and their heirs, we pay homage.
text.en-trans: palden lama gyalwa sé dang chepa nam kyi zhab la chaktsal lo

text.en: Care for me at all times with your magnificent love, alleviate all the terrors of deluded perception during this life, the next and the bardo states, inspire us to recognise the bardos and lead us to a pure realm, we pray.
text.en-trans: tsewa chenpö dü tamché du jesu zung zhing di chiwar dö trulnang jiktrak tamché lé ukyung zhing bardo rang ngoshepa dang dakpé zhing du drenpar jingyi lab tu sol

text.en: You protect from all the torridity and torment of conditioned existence,
text.en-trans: sipé tsadung kün lé kyob dzé ching

text.en: And the mere thought of you closes the door to lower realms,
text.en-trans: drenpa tsam gyi ngensong go gekpa

text.en: Revealer of the path to liberation, gracious lord of Dharma,
text.en-trans: tarpé lam tön drinchen chö kyi jé

text.en: Supreme guide, great face and embodiment of all sources of refuge, care for us!
text.en-trans: dren chok kyab kündü zhal chenpo khyen

text.en: As we pray to you with ardent, single-pointed devotion
text.en-trans: dakchak tsechik mögü shuk drakpö

text.en: And without the slightest duplicity or hypocrisy,
text.en-trans: khazhé ngö kok mepar soldeb na

text.en: Look upon us with compassion in this life, the next and throughout the bardo states.
text.en-trans: di chi bardo küntu tukjé zik

text.en: Guru, essence of unfailing refuge, care for us!
text.en-trans: lumé kyab kyi nyingpo lama khyen

text.en: When it comes time to die, may we not experience a sudden, painful end,
text.en-trans: chiwé tsé na néchö minjung zhing

text.en: But instead hold the natural state of awareness
text.en-trans: shepa rang sa zin ching lama la

text.en: And pray to the guru with yearning faith and devotion,
text.en-trans: dé mö dungwé solwa deb zhindu

text.en: While we practically apply the instructions for the moment of death.
text.en-trans: chikhé dampa lam du longpar shok

text.en: Holding the hook of mindfulness and vigilance during meditation and thereafter,
text.en-trans: detar nyamjé küntu dren shé kyi

text.en: May we recognise all these deluded perceptions
text.en-trans: chakkyü zung né trulnang didak nam

text.en: As the appearances of the intermediate state
text.en-trans: bardö nangwa yinpé dushé kyi

text.en: And thus apply the path to the bardo of birth and death.
text.en-trans: kyeshi bardo lam du khyerwar shok

text.en: No matter how these appearances of outer world and inhabitants may arise,
text.en-trans: nöchü nangwa jitar sharwa nam

text.en: They are by nature empty.
text.en-trans: shar yang denpé tongpé rangzhin du

text.en: Recognising this and transforming them into yidam deities and wisdom,
text.en-trans: shé né yidam lha dang yeshe su

text.en: May we apply the path to the bardo of dream.
text.en-trans: gyurwé milam bardo lam jé shok

text.en: When the appearances of this life are about to fade away,
text.en-trans: tsé di nangwa nubpar nyewa na

text.en: The five winds will dissolve, the five chakras disintegrate.
text.en-trans: lung nga tim zhing khorlo nga zhikpé

text.en: Physical strength will diminish, the sound of voices grow unclear,
text.en-trans: lü kyi tob nyam ngak gi dra mi sal

text.en: Memory will deteriorate and consciousness become dim.
text.en-trans: dren nyam shepa zazir chowa dang

text.en: Sensory awareness will fade and objects become imperceptible.
text.en-trans: wangshé tim zhing döyön ro mi nyong

text.en: Then may we recognise the signs—
text.en-trans: duwa mikgyu mekhyer marmé yi

text.en: Of smoke, haze, fireflies, and lamps—
text.en-trans: nangwé tak nam rang ngoshepa dang

text.en: And apply the instruction of the triple moment of passing.1
text.en-trans: daka sum gyi dampa lam jé shok

text.en: The subtle stages of dissolution are appearance, increase and attainment.
text.en-trans: trawé timrim nang ché tob sum té

text.en: When consciousness dissolves into appearance,
text.en-trans: ditar namshé nangwa la tim tsé

text.en: The white element descends and there is total whiteness.
text.en-trans: kar cha tur bab karlam charwa dang

text.en: The thirty-three thought-states associated with anger cease.2
text.en-trans: döchak lé gyur tokpa zhibchu gak

text.en: At that time may we recognise the wisdom of appearance.
text.en-trans: detsé nangwé yeshe ngö zin shok

text.en: Then when appearance dissolves into increase,
text.en-trans: dené nangwa chepa la tim tsé

text.en: The red element ascends and there is an experience of total redness.
text.en-trans: mar cha gyen yö marlam nangwa char

text.en: The forty thought-states associated with desire cease.
text.en-trans: zhedang lé gyur tokpa so sum gak

text.en: Then may we recognise the wisdom of increase.
text.en-trans: chepé yeshe rang ngoshepar shok

text.en: Then, between whiteness and redness consciousness is lost.
text.en-trans: dené kar mar bardu namshé gyal

text.en: The seven thought-states associated with delusion cease,
text.en-trans: timuk lé gyur tokpa dün gak té

text.en: And there is a vision of blackness, approaching unconsciousness.
text.en-trans: naklam gyalwar chokpa dé yi tsé

text.en: At that time may we recognise the wisdom of attainment.
text.en-trans: tobpé yeshe rang ngo zinpar shok

text.en: Then, when the ground luminosity of near-attainment dawns,
text.en-trans: dené nyertob zhi yi ösal ni

text.en: Beyond ordinary mental objects and clear as an autumn sky,
text.en-trans: lo yi yul dé tön nam dangpa tar

text.en: May the child-like path luminosity
text.en-trans: char tsé lam gyi ösal bu tabu

text.en: Meet the mother that is the clear light of the ground.
text.en-trans: zhi yi ösalma dang trepar shok

text.en: If, due to our weak familiarity at that stage,
text.en-trans: galté dü der gom dri chungwa yi

text.en: We fail in recognition, then, in an instant,
text.en-trans: rang ngoma shé dé yi mö nyi la

text.en: The appearances of the bardo of becoming will dawn,
text.en-trans: sipa bardö nangwa sharwa na

text.en: And when the four dreadful sounds, three terrifying abysses,
text.en-trans: jikpé dra zhi nyam ngé yangsa sum

text.en: And six uncertain experiences arise,
text.en-trans: ma ngé tak druk nomja sharwé tsé

text.en: May we recollect the guru, the deity and the view,
text.en-trans: lama lha dang tawa jedren né

text.en: And take rebirth in a pure celestial realm.
text.en-trans: dakpa khachö zhing du kyewar shok

text.en: Even if we are connected to a place of birth,
text.en-trans: galté kyené dzinpar gyur na ang

text.en: May we close the womb-door of any lesser form of rebirth
text.en-trans: ngal go ngenpa gak ching chöden gyi

text.en: And seek the excellent support of a dharma practitioner.
text.en-trans: ten zang tsal né kham druk denpé lü

text.en: May we gain a form complete with the six elements
text.en-trans: tob né kyé matakpa denyi du

text.en: And meet a spiritual guide as soon as we are reborn,
text.en-trans: geweshé dang jal né dampé chö

text.en: So that we may practise the sacred Dharma authentically, without error.
text.en-trans: manor tsulzhin chöpa nyi gyur chik

text.en: In short, in all future lives and rebirths
text.en-trans: dorna kyé dang tserab tamché du

text.en: May we follow the path praised by the victorious ones,
text.en-trans: gyalwé ngakpé lam la rab zhuk té

text.en: Savour the sūtra and mantra Dharma of the Great Vehicle,
text.en-trans: tekchen do ngak chö la longchö né

text.en: And realize the fruition of the four kāyas.
text.en-trans: ku zhi drebu ngön du tobpar shok
